thread.title: The setting sun bids farewell to the eventful 2023. The River Meghna embraces the twilight as the sun dips below the horizon on the last day of the year, casting vibrant colours across its flowing water. The picture was taken from the bank of the River Meghna in Ashuganj, Brahmanbaria. -Focus bangla
